items.title: Morning commute
items.content_html: It‚Äôs been a little over a year since I‚Äôve moved to Seattle and my commute switched to being reliant on mass transit. For the most part it‚Äôs been glorious but it does have the occasional challenge. Today‚Äôs morning commute involved trains being single tracked, having to switch trains at the second stop, and then train losing power in the tunnel between stations for about 5 minutes. With all that it still took me less time to get to work as compared to my old commute by car in California.
items.content_text: It‚Äôs been a little over a year since I‚Äôve moved to Seattle and my commute switched to being reliant on mass transit. For the most part it‚Äôs been glorious but it does have the occasional challenge. Today‚Äôs morning commute involved trains being single tracked, having to switch trains at the second stop, and then train losing power in the tunnel between stations for about 5 minutes. With all that it still took me less time to get to work as compared to my old commute by car in California.
